repnme.cdata!:
Jordan - Greater Amman Water Supply and
            Sewerage Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Greater Amman Water Supply and
            Sewerage Project will improve the water supply and sewerage
            services in The Greater Amman area.  It will include:  (i)
            extension and rehabilitation of about 100 km of water mains;
            (ii) construction of about 350 km of trunk and collection
            sewers; and (iii) construction of two sewage treatment
            works.  The Greater Amman Water Supply and Sewerage Project
            will further involve (iv) supply of operating and
            maintenance equipment; and (v) consultant services for
            engineering, project management and construction
            supervision.  It will also continue the institutional
            development efforts started under two previous Bank loans.
            The main beneficiaries of the project will be the low and
            middle-income families in the project area.

docna.cdata!:
Jordan - Greater Amman Water Supply and
            Sewerage Project

display_title.display_title:
Jordan - Greater Amman Water
            Supply and Sewerage Project
